snippet: They have hired the Blackstone Group to run the process; among those said to have held early conversations: Jared Kushner, the owner of The New York Observer; Thomson Reuters; Yahoo; and Bloomberg L.P.
abstract: They have hired the Blackstone Group to run the process; among those said to have held early conversations: Jared Kushner, the owner of The New York Observer; Thomson Reuters; Yahoo; and Bloomberg L.P.

headline.main: The New Republic's Owners Consider a Sale
